description: The v1.0 spec allows a user to update an instance password by doing a PUT on /servers/<id>. The v1.1 spec moves this functionality to a changePassword action.
title: OSAPI v1.1 should not support password update on PUT /servers/<id>

comments.content: The v1.0 spec allows a user to update an instance password by doing a PUT on /servers/<id>. The v1.1 spec moves this functionality to a changePassword action.
